channel.title: How to make a vmt file for a custom glock skin
channel.description: I have a custom texture for the Glock, but it only shows for a few seconds after I fire the Glock. I know I can fix this by screwing around with a vmt file, but I'm inexperienced with them because I mainly make TF2 skins, which don't require a vmt file. Also, I'm on Steam. TL;DR, I need some help making a vmt file for the Glock, I'm on the Steam version.

item.title: How to make a vmt file for a custom glock skin
item.dc:creator: Xamareik
item.description:
I don’t know. It’s a good tool for generating them, but I don’t know what to add to make it show the skin all the time

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a vmt file for a custom glock skin
